title: Peanut Butter Milkshake

ingredients.content: 30 g dark chocolate (50% cocoa), cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place peanuts in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place 20 g peanut butter, dark chocolate and 20 g milk in mixing bowl then melt <b>3 min/50°C/speed 2<b>. Transfer peanut butter-chocolate sauce to a bowl and allow to cool for 5 minutes. Clean mixing bowl.

<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place cream and icing sugar in mixing bowl then whip without measuring cup <b>speed 3<b>, without setting a time, until desired stiffness is achieved, watching carefully to avoid overwhipping. <b>Remove butterfly whisk,<b> transfer whipped cream to an icing bag and cool in refrigerator.

Place 120 g peanut butter, 350 g milk, chocolate ice cream and ice cubes in mixing bowl then blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 10<b>. Garnish 4 glasses with reserved peanut butter-chocolate sauce and transfer milkshake to garnished glasses. Top with reserved whipped cream and chopped peanuts. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: For a peanut butter cheesecake milkshake, replace the milk and cream with 150 g cream cheese, 250 g greek yogurt and 150 g whole milk.
